name: A Plunge into Darkness
description:
• High production values and quality "dark" atmosphere for a deeper immersion
  • Customize your characters - they get different boosts for killing enemy bosses (including optional ones)
  • Visible encounters
  • Mouse control
  • An Halloween tale full of twists and turns
  • Grim, immersive atmosphere

RECOMMENDATIONS


If you liked this game, you may also like:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/615690/Inferno/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/644870/Fortress_of_Hell/
